Address.label: Address
Address.value: NO. 485 ZHENGLI ROAD,BUILDING 3, GUOZHENG CENTER, YANGPU DISTRICT, SHANGHAI, 200433, China

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Bilibili is a Chinese online entertainment platform that is best known for its video-sharing site that resembles YouTube. The site was founded in 2009 and started as a long-form video platform for anime, comics, and gaming, or ACG, content that appealed to Gen Z users. Since then, it has expanded its content on the platform to include a broader range of interests that have attracted Chinese users outside of the Gen Z cohort. The firm generates revenue through five main areas: advertising, mobile games, live streaming, value-added services, and e-commerce.
